item.description:
Gregg Alan Rolie is an American keyboardist, organist, and singer, who is one of the founding members of the bands Santana, Journey, The Storm, and Abraxas Pool, as well as his current Gregg Rolie Band. Rolie was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame with Santana. If you know the song "Black Magic Woman"....you've heard Gregg Rolie sing!!!

He has reunited with other Santana band members to bring back the hits, including "Black Magic Woman," "Evil Ways," and "Oye Como Va"

Join PartyExpress and The New Haven Wine and Dining Group for a fun evening
item.how_to_find_us: Denise is bringing a meetup sign

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: "BLACK MAGIC WOMEN" Santana's Own Gregg Rolie in Concert FREE Hamden Green"
